queries.exists: SELECT 1 FROM programs WHERE name = 'Microsoft Edge' AND publisher = 'Microsoft Corporation';

refs.9a7c1e76:
$product_code = {1CB45CC8-F470-3CB1-B1E0-E147C3DC2BFE}

# Fleet uninstalls app using product code that's extracted on upload
msiexec /quiet /x $product_code
Exit $LASTEXITCODE
